title: Xiaohan Liu
text:
Hello! I am a first-year Biostatistics PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania. I broadly interested in topics under causal inference.
Before joining the PhD program, I obtained my BS in Statistics and Data Science from Carnegie Mellon University.
For chats about research ideas, potential collaborations, music, or books, feel free to reach out at liuxh[at]upenn[dot]edu!

title: Music
text: Music has always been an important part of my life. I played flute in my middle school band, high school marching band, wind ensmeble, full orchestra, TMEA Region Band, Orchestra, and All-State Band. At CMU, I was lucky to continue playing as part of the All-University Orchestra.
